summary: The Thieves Guild fence/ bartender at the meadery actually continues to sell mead :D ! Plus a few more fenced items than before. Good especially if using a mod that makes mead/drink "even more" desirable...Description has small TG early questline spoilers!!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#f1c232][b][size=3]
For realisms sake: Mallus= thieves guild operative & fence who starts working at the Honningbrew meadery after a certain TG quest, will really sell Honningbrew mead -and some Black Briar as well, because of the companies "merging" ;).[/size][/b][/color][/font][font=Tahoma][color=#ffd966][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][color=#ff7700][size=3]
[color=#f1c232][b]And a slight Bonus [/b][/color]: Mallus now also sells common tavern foods plus his fence inventory is a bit better, = he sells more random loot/junk/goodies your fellow thieves have fenced (stuff from a couple of fitting lvled lists)... Nothing too unbalanced I hope, though there might be a chance to get luckier "drops" on sale sometimes.
Enjoy!
[/size][/color][color=#ff7700]
compatibility:
Only changes TG Mallus Maccius fence chest item directly.= If you use a mod that changes TG fences chests, but prefer this for Mallus just load this plugin last.
[/color]
author: mistress miaura
